articles.title: Azerbaijan President to Develop Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Azerbaijan President to Develop Relations with DPRK
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Azerbaijan President Ilham Aliyev on Thursday.
					 Ri is heading the DPRK government delegation to the foreign ministerial meeting of the non-aligned movement in Azerbaijan.
					
					 Noting the DPRK government delegation's visit to Azerbaijan offered an important occasion in developing the bilateral relations, the president said he sincerely congratulates the DPRK government on its recent successes for preserving regional peace and stability.
					
					 Azerbaijan regards the DPRK as a friendly country and is strongly willing to boost the bilateral relations, the president said, hoping that mutual support and cooperation would be strengthened in the international arena including the non-aligned movement and the UN.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Heads of Foreign Government Delegations
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Heads of Foreign Government Delegations
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho, who is leading the DPRK government delegation, separately met and had a talk with the heads of government delegations of Venezuela, Iran, Cuba, Indonesia and Togo who participated in the foreign ministers' meeting of the non-aligned movement held in Azerbaijan on April 5.
					 At the meetings the heads of the delegations said the recent advance in the development of the inter-Korean relations is a fruition of the brilliant wisdom and patriotic bold decision of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They expressed the will to strengthen the friendly relations with the DPRK in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Yong Dae Meets Delegation of "Prominent Personages in Asia"
articles.content:
Kim Yong Dae Meets Delegation of "Prominent Personages in Asia"
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of "Prominent Personages in Asia" headed by Dino Patti Djalal, founder of the Foreign Policy Community of Indonesia, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Baath Arab Socialist Party
articles.content:
Congratulations to Baath Arab Socialist Party
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Friday sent a congratulatory message to the Regional Leadership of the Baath Arab Socialist Party on its 71st founding anniversary.
					 The message said that the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea is very pleased over the fact that the Syrian army and people have achieved great successes in the struggle to protect the sovereignty, dignity and territorial integrity of the country under the leadership of President Bashar Al-Assad and the Baath Arab Socialist Party, extending firm support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Party.
					
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the Workers' Party of Korea and the Baath Arab Socialist Party, forged through the common struggle for independence against imperialism, would invariably strengthen, the message sincerely wished the Baath Arab Socialist Party bigger successes in its just cause for peace, stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Remodeling of Cemetery of Fallen Soldiers of CPV Starts
articles.content:
Remodeling of Cemetery of Fallen Soldiers of CPV Starts
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Remodeling of the Cemetery of Fallen Soldiers of the Chinese People's Volunteers (CPV) in Kangdong County, Pyongyang City started with due ceremony on Friday on the occasion of Chongmyong (one of the 24 seasonal divisions in Korea).
					 In the cemetery there are remains of soldiers of the CPV, who fell in the fight against the imperialist allied forces during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Song Chol, vice-minister of Urban Management, officials concerned and working people in Kangdong County, Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials and Chinese guests staying here including various delegations.
					
					 Wreaths in the names of the Ministry of Urban Management, the Pyongyang City People's Committee, the Chinese embassy and several Chinese delegations were laid at the cemetery.
					
					 The participants paid a silent tribute in memory of the fallen CPV soldiers.
					
					 Li Jinjun said that the Chinese People's Volunteers and the army and people of the DPRK waged a hard-fought struggle shoulder to shoulder during the Korean War and that the contributions made by the fallen soldiers who showed the militant friendship between the two peoples by devoting their precious lives and youths would be remembered. 
					
					 He hoped that the remodeling of the cemetery, which is of important significance in developing the traditional China-DPRK friendship, would be completed on the highest level by the joint efforts.
					
					 Choe Song Chol referred to the heroic feats of the CPV fighters who bravely fought with the Korean people against the common enemy under the banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He stressed the need to finish the remodeling of the cemetery by the appointed day and thus contribute to making the feats of the fallen soldiers be long cherished in the minds of the armies and peoples of the two countries.
					
					 The participants broke ground.

articles.title: Women's Union Officials and Members Meet
articles.content:
Women's Union Officials and Members Meet
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Women's union officials and members met at the Hall of Women on Friday to celebrate the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials and members of the women's union.
					
					 Jang Chun Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the DPRK could foil the outrageous challenges by the imperialists, firmly defend socialism and demonstrate the dignity of Juche Korea as it held Kim Jong Il in the highest post of the state.
					
					 They said Kim Jong Il provided a firm military guarantee for successfully advancing the building of a powerful socialist country, out of his maxim that military muscle precisely means the national strength and strong arms guarantee socialism and safety and happiness of the people.
					
					 They urged all women's union officials and members to dedicate their all to the struggle for accomplishing the great historic cause of building a powerful socialist nation, true to the intention and wishes of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Seminar Held by Workers and Members of GFTUK
articles.content:
Seminar Held by Workers and Members of GFTUK
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il was held by workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) at the Central Hall of Workers on Friday to mark the 25th anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Speakers at the seminar stressed that the country was firmly defended under the guidance of Kim Jong Il elected as chairman of the NDC. 
					
					 They noted that Kim Jong Il developed in depth President Kim Il Sung's idea of attaching importance to the arms into the Songun revolutionary idea and the Songun political theory and set forth the theory on the building of a socialist powerful nation, thus indicating a shortcut to frustrating the imperialists' high-handed and arbitrary practices and speeding up the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 To hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal chairman of the NDC of the DPRK is the principled demand for victoriously advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche by invariably holding fast to his idea and line, they stated.
					
					 They called upon all the workers and members of the GFTUK to glorify the idea and feats of Kim Jong Il and fully display the might of the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class in the all-out drive to celebrate the 70th founding anniversary of the DPRK with labor achievements under the guidance of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Present at the seminar were officials concerned, officials and members of the GFTUK and other workers.

articles.title: National Industrial Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Industrial Art Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- A national industrial art exhibition on the theme of "Great Heyday of Juche Industrial Art Development" opened with due ceremony at the National Industrial Art Exhibition House on Friday to celebrate the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Presented to it are more than 800 designs, models and products including the design of a tram for the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, designs related to the Samjiyon Potato Farina Production Factory, designs of Korean-style metro trams and trademark designs for products of the Ryongaksan Soap Factory.
					
					 Also on display are at least 700 designs, products, models and video clips in different fields made by creators, teachers, researchers, students and amateurs from across the country. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials concerned, creators, teachers, researchers and students.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Martial Art Championship Opens
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Martial Art Championship Opens
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize National Martial Art Championship opened here to mark the Day of the Sun.
					 At least 500 men and women players from 20 odd organizations including Taekwon-Do teams throughout the country will compete in various events including Taekwon-Do and Paduk during the championship.
					
					 Its opening ceremony took place at the Taekwon-Do Hall on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, Kim Yong Ho, secretary general of the Cabinet, Kim Chun Sik, secretary general of the National Sports Guidance Committee, officials concerned, sports persons and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there was a march-past by the players and a demonstration by players of the Taekwon-Do Team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee.

articles.title: Imperialist Idea and Culture Should Be Rejected: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Imperialist Idea and Culture Should Be Rejected: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The ideological and cultural poisoning by the imperialists is a hideous reactionary offensive to stamp out the popular masses' consciousness of independence and undermine their faith in socialism, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The imperialists, who are keen on aggression and plunder, domination and subjugation, are afraid of the unity of the politically awakened independent people. So they are working hard to stamp out the people's consciousness of independence and estrange and divide them.
					
					 It is the truth proven by the practical experience of the Korean revolution that one can become a victor when one preserves his own ideology.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea gave the fullest play to revolutionary enthusiasm of the popular masses by dynamically conducting the ideological work moving all people in all the stern annals of the revolution, and thus worked epochal miracles in socialist construction. When red flags of the revolution were lowered in various countries due to the vicious moves of the imperialists against socialism, Korean socialism triumphantly advanced.
					
					 To give priority to ideology is the main key to achieving a decisive victory in the fierce showdown with the imperialists and successfully advancing and accomplishing the cause of socialism.
					
					 The man who fails to equip himself with the socialist idea is bound to be poisoned by the imperialists' reactionary idea.
					
					 It is important to set up double and treble mosquito nets in all fields of social life and resolutely reject the imperialist idea and culture.
					
					 No matter how desperately the imperialists work, they can never subdue the people firmly equipped with the socialist idea.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Cooperation with Outsiders
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Cooperation with Outsiders
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Recently there took place the 10th "security meeting" of the U.S., Japan and south Korea in Washington. At the meeting the south Korean authorities agreed to continue a missile warning drill and anti-submarine exercise and to "work hard to restrain the north from illegal transshipment of goods in sea waters," calling for "close cooperation to cope with threat from the north."
					 The south Korean authorities' close cooperation for anti-DPRK confrontation provokes the dialogue partner and so we cannot overlook it, Minju Joson Friday says in a commentary.
					
					 Needless to say, the 10th "security meeting" was the sinister confab for sustained military confrontation with the DPRK and sanctions and pressure upon it, going against the present phase of detente on the Korean Peninsula, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities talk about "dialogue" but cooperate with outside forces for aggression behind the scene. This is the intolerable mockery of the dialogue partner and unpardonable challenge to the aspiration and demand of all the fellow countrymen and the international community for more favorable climate for detente on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' cooperation with outsiders under the pretexts of "threat from the north" and "close cooperation" will result in helping the outsiders who are trying to draw water to their mill through estrangement and division of the Korean nation.
					
					 Cooperation with outsiders leads to self-destruction.
					
					 All Koreans should pool their strength to check and frustrate the moves of the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries so as not to repeat the bitter lesson of a stateless nation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should immediately stop all the acts harmful to the dignity and interests of the nation.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Tanzania
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Tanzania
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- A Tanzanian preparatory committee for marking the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed in Dar es Salaam on Mar. 19.
					 Maina, secretary general of the TanzaniaÔºçDPRK Friendship Association who is vice-chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to hold colorful political and cultural events such as seminar and lecture in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Barbados
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Barbados
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- A Barbados preparatory committee for marking the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed on Mar. 27.
					 David Denny, chairman of the Barbados Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the 106th birth anniversary of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Cambodia
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Live and Work in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu, the Spirit of the Blizzards of Paektu" was brought out in booklet by the Angkor Thom Publishing House of Cambodia on Mar. 29 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on Oct. 27, Juche 103 (2014), says that everyone should know Mt Paektu to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, indicating the tasks of living and struggling in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of blizzards of Paektu, and others.

articles.title: Russian Bodies Congratulate Kim Jong Un on His Successful China Visit
articles.content:
Russian Bodies Congratulate Kim Jong Un on His Successful China Visit
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Russian organizations issued statements on April 1 to congratulate respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on his successful China visit.
					 The Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that the news of Kim Jong Un's China visit is arousing profound interest of Russians from all walks of life, adding:
					
					 The meeting between the leaders of the DPRK and China under the circumstances of the imperialists' frantic moves to stifle the global cause of independence was impressive, indeed, and it indicates that the progressive forces aspiring to independence and justice should unite more firmly so as to strengthen solidarity.
					
					 We hope that the DPRK-China friendship, which was formed at the cost of blood during the struggle against their common enemy, would be ever-lasting in the future, too.
					
					 The Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia said:
					
					 We were deeply moved to hear the news of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un's China visit.
					
					 The leaders of the DPRK and China confirmed that it is the steadfast stand and will of their parties and governments to prioritize and develop the bilateral friendship.
					
					 We fully back all the steps taken by Comrade Kim Jong Un to cope with the persistent moves of the imperialists to stifle socialist Korea.
					
					 The branch of the Republic of Altay of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Un's China visit is praised by the world peace-loving progressives, sincerely hoping that the traditional DPRK-China friendship would be boosted day by day and that the unity and cooperation between the two peoples would further develop.

articles.title: Presidente azerbaijanes expresa voluntad de desarrollar las relaciones con la RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente azerbaijanes expresa voluntad de desarrollar las relaciones con la RPDC
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Ri Yong Ho, quien participa en la reunion de los cancilleres del Movimiento de los No Alineados, sesionada en Azerbaijan, en calidad de jefe de la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 5 con el presidente de la Republica de Azerbaijan, Ilham Aliyev.
					El mandatario anfitrion dijo que la visita a su pais de la delegacion coreana deviene una oportunidad importante para el desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales y agrego que felicita sinceramente los ultimos exitos logrados por el gobierno coreano en defender la paz y la estabilidad de la region.
					
					Azerbaijan tiene la fuerte voluntad de desarrollar las relaciones con la RPDC considerandola como pais amistoso, apunto y deseo que se consoliden el apoyo y la cooperacion mutuos en los escenarios internacionales como el MNOAL y la ONU.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho se reune con los jefes de delegaciones de varios paises
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho se reune con los jefes de delegaciones de varios paises
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- Ri Yong Ho, ministro de Relaciones Exteriores y jefe de la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 5 por separado con los jefes de las delegaciones gubernamentales de Venezuela, Iran, Cuba, Indonesia y Togo quienes participan en la reunion de los cancilleres del Movimiento de los No Alineados, sesionada en Azerbaijan.
					En las charlas, los jefes de delegaciones senalaron que el ultimo avance logrado en el desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas es el resultado de la perspicacia y la decision valiente y patriotica del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Expresaron la voluntad de fortalecer y desarrollar en el futuro las relaciones de amistad con la RPDC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Dae se reune con la delegacion de "Personalidades Ilustres de Asia"
articles.content:
Kim Yong Dae se reune con la delegacion de "Personalidades Ilustres de Asia"
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- El vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Dae, departio el dia 6 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion de "Personalidades Ilustres de Asia", encabezada por el fundador de la comunidad de politica exterior de Indonesia, Dino Patti Djalal, que le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: CC de PTC felicita 71o aniversario de fundacion de BAAS
articles.content:
CC de PTC felicita 71o aniversario de fundacion de BAAS
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 71o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe (BAAS), el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion a la Direccion Regional de esa organizacion.
					El mensaje expresa gran satisfaccion por los grandes exitos que logran los militares y habitantes de Siria, bajo la direccion  del presidente Bashar al-Assad y el BAAS, en la lucha por defender la soberania, dignidad e integridad territorial del pais y envia el firme apoyo y solidaridad a la lucha justa del BAAS.
					
					Convencido de que se consolidaran y se desarrollaran en el futuro tambien las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre el PTC y el BAAS, establecidas en la lucha conjunta por la independencia antiimperialista, formula sinceros votos por mayores exitos en el cumplimiento de la justa causa del BAAS para alcanzar la paz, estabilidad y prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Tiene lugar ceremonia de inicio de reconstruccion de tumbas de martires chinos
articles.content:
Tiene lugar ceremonia de inicio de reconstruccion de tumbas de martires chinos
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo de Chongmyong (la quinta de las 24 divisiones estacionales del ano), tuvo lugar el dia 6 la ceremonia de inicio de la reconstruccion y reparacion de las tumbas de los martires del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino, situado en el distrito de Kangdong de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					En ese lugar estan enterrados los restos mortales de los martires chinos caidos en la batalla contra las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953).
					
					En la ocasion participaron el viceministro de Urbanismo, Choe Song Chol, y otros funcionarios interesados, los trabajadores del distrito de Kangdong. Tambien, estuvieron presentes el embajador Li Jinjun y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica de la Republica Popular China en Corea y los huespedes chinos, inclusive varias delegaciones, que permanecen ahora en la RPDC.
					
					Ante las tumbas fueron depositadas las ofrendas florales en nombre del Ministerio de Urbanismo, el Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, la embajada china y varias delegaciones chinas.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires.
					
					A continuacion, hubo intervenciones.
					
					Li Jinjun recordo que en la pasada guerra coreana, el Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino libro la enconada lucha hombro a hombro junto con el ejercito y pueblo coreanos y agrego que no olvidaran la contribucion de los martires que demostraron la amistad combativa de los pueblos de ambos paises ofrendando su valiosa vida y juventud.
					
					Deseo que gracias a los esfuerzos conjuntos, termine en el mejor nivel esta obra de reconstruccion y reparacion de las tumbas que tiene gran importancia para consolidar y desarrollar la tradicional amistad China-Corea.
					
					Choe Song Chol se refirio a los meritos heroicos de los soldados del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino quienes durante la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria lucharon con valentia junto con el pueblo coreano contra el enemigo comun bajo la bandera de "resistir a los yanquis, ayudar a Corea, y defender el hogar y el pais propios".
					
					Anadio que concluira a tiempo la obra para contribuir al trabajo para que los meritos de los martires se guarden siempre en el corazon de los militares y habitantes de Corea y China.
					
					Los participantes dieron la primera palada de la obra.

articles.title: Inaugurada Exposicion Estatal de Bellas Artes Industriales
articles.content:
Inaugurada Exposicion Estatal de Bellas Artes Industriales
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- En homenaje al Dia del Sol, natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, quedo inaugurada la Exposicion Estatal de Bellas Artes Industriales bajo el tema de "Era dorada de desarrollo de las bellas artes industriales del Juche".
					En esta ocasion se presentaron mas de 800 disenos, entre otros, los del tranvia del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, los relativos con la Fabrica de Harina de Patata de Samjiyon, los del tren electrico del metro al estilo coreano y los de marcas de productos de la Fabrica de Jabones Ryongaksan.
					
					Se ven tambien las maquetas y los productos hechos con esos disenos.
					
					Se expusieron igualmente por ramas mas de 700 disenos, productos, maquetas, fotos y videos presentados por los creadores, profesores, investigadores, estudiantes y aficionados a bellas artes industriales de todo el pais.
					
					Todas las muestras comprueban la vitalidad de bellas artes industriales que se desarrollan bajo la direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					La ceremonia de apertura tuvo lugar el dia 6 en la Exposicion Estatal Permanente de Bellas Artes Industriales. 
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios interesados y los creadores, profesores, investigadores y estudiantes.

articles.title: Inaugurado Campeonato Nacional de Artes Marciales por el Premio Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Inaugurado Campeonato Nacional de Artes Marciales por el Premio Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado en esta capital el Campeonato Nacional de Artes Marciales por el Premio Mangyongdae dedicado al Dia del Sol.
					Durante esta cita deportiva en que participan mas de 500 jugadores de ambos sexos seleccionados en mas de 20 entidades inclusive las selecciones de Taekwondo de distintas localidades, se realizaran los juegos de Taekwondo, Paduk (go-chess) y otras disciplinas.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 6 en el Palacio de Taekwondo la ceremonia de inauguracion.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Choe Hwi, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, el secretario general del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Yong Ho, el secretario general del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes,   Kim Chun Sik, los funcionarios interesados, los deportistas y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El presidente del Comite de Taekwondo de Corea, Kim Kyong Ho, pronuncio el discurso de apertura.
					
					Acto seguido, se efectuaron el desfile de los jugadores y la demostracion de los integrantes de la seleccion del Comite de Taekwondo de Corea.
